name: Personal Finance Tracker
description: Say goodbye to scattered spreadsheets and hello to financial clarity.Effortlessly track your income and expenses with this personal finance tracker. This finance tracker is fully customizable, allowing you to tailor it to your specific needs. It includes a variety of features such as a simple and easy-to-use interface, a clear overview of your financial situation, and an automated balance calculator.This is perfect if you are:Looking to improve your budgeting and financial planningLooking for an
features: Looking to improve your budgeting and financial planning; Looking for an automated and smart record keeping; Looking for insights on patterns and trends; Automated Balance Calculator: It automatically calculates your income & expenses for you; Budget Tracker: Set your budget and track your progress for the month; Income & Expense database: Easy to fill database; How do I use it?As long as you have a Notion account, all you have to do is download the page and hit duplicate at the top right of the template.; I don't have a paid account, does this still work?Yes!
